400.description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

401.description: No valid credentials found to access the requested resource.

404.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

429.description: An API request rate limit has been exceeded.

500.description: An internal error occurred while processing the API request.
